sense.gloss: prodigy, talented person, person of exceptional talent, genius
person of great talent, gifted person
form of bondage torture in which the victim is hung from the ceiling with their hands and legs bound behind them and a rock placed on their back (Edo period)
Suruga (former province located in the central and northern parts of present-day Shizuoka Prefecture)

sdata.j: ↑最↑↓もっと↓も↑野性↑↓やせい↓↑的↑↓てき↓な↑子↑↓こ↓↑馬↑↓ば↓が↑最高↑↓さいこう↓の↑駿馬↑↓しゅんめ↓になる。
sdata.e: The wildest colt makes the best horse.

sdata.j: ↑駿河湾↑↓するがわん↓から↑見↑↓み↓た↑富士山↑↓ふじさん↓は↑美↑↓うつく↓しい。
sdata.e: Mt. Fuji as seen from Suruga Bay is beautiful.

sdata.j: 「↑風↑↓かぜ↓↑立↑↓た↓ちぬ」は↑宮崎↑↓みやざき↓↑駿↑↓しゅん↓の↑最後↑↓さいご↓の↑映画↑↓えいが↓です。
sdata.e: The Wind Rises is Hayao Miyazaki's last film.

words.gloss: prodigy, talented person, person of exceptional talent, genius
